subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid was stunned by Levante, 1-0, in the Spanish league, with Arouna Kone scoring in the 68th minute to give the hosts its first-ever victory in seven league home games over the perennial power.
snippet: Real Madrid was stunned by Levante, 1-0, in the Spanish league, with Arouna Kone scoring in the 68th minute to give the hosts its first-ever victory in seven league home games over the perennial power.
